name: Cloudy XMAS Crew
description:
-----------------------

LIMITED EDITION HOLIDAY CREW i'm not going to lie, that week between x-mas and new years i'm probably going to do more damage to my liver than any average person could handle... and i'm not proud of it, but what else are the holidays for? i figure if found passed out in a gutter somewhere wearing this crew neck, hopefully someone will be kind enough to pick me back up just long enough to swear off alcohol and make a resolution to be a better person... you know, next year. Super Limited Run... get em while they last...

name: ITC-Beanie
description: it's gonna be cold soon... keep your dome warm

name: Toothgrinder - Vibration/Colour/Frequency
description: ----------------------- when I first got to know the guys in Toothgrinder there was an automatic respect for their DIY approach - recording their own music, booking their own tours, designing their own merch and standing out from other bands with a style of their own without any fucks to give. we had talked about working together on a vinyl, but it wasn't until we discovered our common bond of patriotism that sealed the deal. Inspired by ol' glory we designed a jacket made of fabric - each hand cut, acid washed/tie-dyed, then sewn and screen printed... an ambitious design considering I had no idea how to sew. luckily my mom has an old machine from the 70's and the patience of a saint to show me how it works. the vinyl itself is available in 2 colors and also has the cover art screened on the B-side: (120) - red/white/blue vinyl w/ tie-dyed jacket (180) - doublemint green vinyl w/ acid washed jacket tracklisting:: A Side: Vibration Colour Frequency B Side: Screen Printed Art

name: Birds of Prey tank
description: Stomp, clap. Stomp-stomp, clap. Stomp, clap. Stomp-stomp, clap. Stomp, clap. Stomp-stomp, clap. Ahh-aa-aa-ahh

name: Owel
description:
<iframe class="vine-embed" src="https://vine.co/v/bFPpp3IztLt/embed/postcard" width="329" height="329" frameborder="0"></iframe><script async src="//platform.vine.co/static/scripts/embed.js" charset="utf-8"></script>

-----------------------

this release should come as no surprise to those of you who received a Old Nick flexi vinyl promo in with your order, to me it was really just a matter of them finding a band name they could stick with... i've known the guys (+ lady) in Owel for some time and have always kept their music near to my heart... Jay & Jane even played the music for my wedding ceremony. 

when coming up with an idea for the packaging, i wanted to create something that put the focus on the music, almost making it instrument on it's own... the first time i heard the opening track "snowglobe" it just seemed to make sense to find a way to embed a mini playable piano inside the jacket. 

with a little internet research and an overseas wire transfer later, i was able to get a hold of all the parts, then hand assembled/glued each jacket together. hope you enjoy. 

Pressing info:
2xLP Gatefold jacket w/ Built-in Piano - 33RPM 
( 300 ) : Bright Blue Marble

name: Athletics : Who You Are Is Not Enough
description: ----------------------- when i had first worked w/ athletics on why aren't i home? they had just finished recording their a new album - which they described as a concept record that was really 1 song broken down into 5 movements. i wasn't sure what to expect, i just remember thinking it seemed like a bold move... the album did not disappoint. as we started to discuss pressing who you are is not enough i knew how much effort they had put into the album and wanted to find a way for the packaging to also reflect the idea of being 1 thing broken down into five parts. so i designed a package where the entire thing was cut, screen-printed, folded, wax sealed and numbered by hand. a lot of sleepless nights went into the process of making all 300 of these by hand, so i wanted the vinyl color to reflect the things that really helped everything come together - coffee & booze. Pressing info: hand-made / wax sealed vinyl jacket 12" vinyl w/ 2 color variants (150) : Jack & Coke (150) : Cup O' Joe Side A: I II Side B: III IV V

name: Penfold : Our First Taste of Escape Vinyl
description:
Penfold - Our First Taste of Escape 10 Years of Escape Anniversary Vinyl ----------------------- a few months back i went digging through my cd collection in the back of my closet and came across an old copy of penfold's our first taste of escape. i've been listening to it for so long on my ipod i actually forgot i even had a hard copy. i popped it in the stereo and started reminiscing about times spent in church basements and vfw halls... i started reading through the liner notes and found it so hard to believe it had really been 10 years since the album had come out. after doing a little internet detective work, i was able to track down the band and see if they would be interested in re-releasing the album on vinyl. fast forward a few months and here we are with our most ambitious packaging to date. 1st Pressing (300) 2xLP - white w/ blue haze - SOLD OUT ----------------------- this record was really one of the main reasons i started intheclouds. after our 1st pressing sold out, i immediately wanted to do a repress but things around here just snowballed so quickly it never seemed to happen. now here we are, almost 2 years later... i had reached out to the band about playing our anniversary show, i thought what better time to FINALLY get the repress together. just to change things up a bit this time around, we're offering 2 new color variants and a new outer slip cover designed by penfold's own Brian Carley

2nd Pressing
(200) 2xLP - A Side/B Side - Electric Blue & Royal Blue
(300) 2xLP - Transparent Blue w/ Black & White Splatter remastered - 45 RPM double pocket gatefold jacket w/ 12"x10" slip cover Side I: The Opportune Moment Fate, Confidence and an Encounter The Secret Nine Side II: Human Drama Sea of Crisis Our First Taste of Escape Side III: May I Have This Dance The Sound of Jazz Brilliance Side IV: Kissing the Nightmare Reflexivity Early Morning, Maudlin Street

PREORDER 2ND PRESSING - Available Early May

options.name: A Side/B Side: Electric Blue / Royal Blue
Transparent Blue w/ Black & White Splatter

name: 'Murican Scene tee
description: Preshrunk 100% Cotton Charcoal Heather tee Hand screened ----------------- it's no secret we love america - but we also love the american scene... and even though we've never put out their record or talked for that matter, wanted to dedicate a shirt to them for being awesome. the shirt is super fucking soft and i feel like a god-damn patriot when i wear it, you will too.

options.name: Orage Splatter vinyl w/ Tee & Tote

name: Annuals : Be He Me Vinyl
description:
<iframe src="//player.vimeo.com/video/77753751?title=0&byline=0&portrait=0&color=ebe2cc" width="329" height="185" frameborder="0" webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen></iframe>

-----------------------

it's always surprising to find out one of your favorite records has never been pressed... be he me has been an album that always reminds me of happy times.

needless to say i was psyched to hear the band was interested in working together. if you haven't noticed by now, when we put together a release we like to give it a little extra something to set it apart from the rest. i thought the possibilities would be endless to come up with a package that reflects the creativity of the music, but the original artwork was so stunning i didn't want to stray too far from it.

something about the mushrooms on the cover reminded me of a buddy who use to grow them in his closet... half joking i thought how cool it would be if the package could grow, then it just seemed fitting with the bands name. so the idea was sparked and i went for it. 

i hope this release makes the world a little greener, and your days a little brighter. enjoy!


Custom Plantable vinyl package
*Each jacket is made of 100% plantable seed-paper
2xLP - 45 RPM

Available in 2 color variants
(250)  Bronze/Mustard/Olive tri-color stripe
(250) Orange w/ Bronze and Bone splatter


Side A:
Brother
Dry Clothes
Complete Or Completing

Side B:
Carry Around
Chase You Off
Bleary-Eyed

Side C:
Fair
The Bull, And The Goat
Mama

Side D:
Ida, My
Father
Sway

name: ITC Button Pack

name: Happy Body Slow Brain : Dreams of Water
description:
----------------------- shortly after announcing the facing new york vinyl, i started talking to matt from happy body slow brain about releasing dreams of water on vinyl, but we knew the packaging would have to be something extra special. if we could get hot with the matchbook vinyl, i was dead set on finding a way to get wet with dreams of water! after a lot of research we were able to create the wax underwater package, a custom pvc gatefold jacket that's filled with blue liquid and sparkles. inside, each cover has a built-in pocket that holds both 12" vinyls, cut at 45 RPM and available in two color variants: (150) A Side/ B Side: Cyan Blue & Solid White w/ Aqua Blue Splatter (150) A Side/ B Side: Grimace Purple & Sea Blue w/ Coke-Bottle Green Splatter Tracklisting: Side A: Everything You Know Move at Different Speeds (On the Road) Never Loved Time. Side B: We're Strangers Now Drag This On and On (Rain Song) The Flight Up Late Side C: What About Us? Emperor Empty Ocean (Deepest Blues) Side D: You Won't If You Don't Want The Bridge


*Please note before ordering, WATER IS HEAVY.. hence the slightly raised shipping cost.


*International orders ARE accepted, please contact directly for further information.

options.name: Cyan Blue & White w/ Aqua Blue splatter
Grimace Purple & Sea Blue w/ Coke Bottle Green splatter

name: Happy Body Slow Brain : Sleepy EP
description:
as we were planning the dreams of water vinyl, HBSB announced the sleepy ep featuring b-sides and acoustic versions from dreams of water.. so i thought why stop at a 2xLP.. right? i mean, if you're gonna go for it, you go all out! ...and with that, the first intheclouds 10" was born. Available on solid Baby Blue vinyl Tracklisting:

Side A:
We're Really Just Programmed Robots
Never Loved (Demo Version)
Drag This On and On (Rain Song) (Acoustic)

Side B:
Been So Long
Move at Different Speeds (On the Road) (Acoustic)
A Song of Consolation

name: Athletics : Why Aren't I Home? Touch Sensitive Vinyl
description: ----------------------- if there's one thing that i've always loved about nj, it's the wide variety of music that comes out of here. every band adding their own style to the scene... always keeps things interesting. athletics are right in the thick of it all coming out of asbury park. their debut album "why aren't i home?" originally released through deep elm, delivers their own haunting post-rock sound i felt deserved an equally fitting vinyl packaging. over the winter i happened to run into the band hanging out at the court tavern and approached them with the idea of creating an album cover that leaves a ghost image of a hand print on touch, then slowly vanish when let go. we applied the touch sensitive ink by hand to each cover and added a custom diecut logo sticker on the bottom right corner available in 3 different colors w/ matching vinyl. black touch sensitive jacket 12" vinyl w/ 3 different color variants (100) ultra clear w/ black & white splatter (100) sea blue & silver A side/B side colored (100) milky clear w/ oxblood haze Side A: Why Aren't I Home? See You On The Other Side Fairview Jordan Speaking For Everyone I Am Withdrawal Side B: Lullaby August It's Night, It's Enough Affliction The Cost Of Living

options.name: Ultra Clear w/ Black & White Splatter
Sea Blue & Silver  A Side/B Side Colored

name: The Gay Blades : Ghosts vinyl
description: The Gay Blades - Ghosts popup vinyl w/ bonus 7" ----------------------- i've known the gay blades for some time now... we've shared beers, burritos and drove down the highway with our hands on ice til our fingers went numb. when they told me they wanted to release their debut album ghosts on vinyl, i didn't have to think twice. while trying to think of some packaging ideas, i had been spending some time on wheresrandysavage.tumblr.com and it got me thinking of an old wrestlemania iv vhs i had in my basement that had a popup image of hulk hogan between the two tapes. popup gatefold jacket w/ 12" beer colored vinyl & bonus 7" featuring 2 new songs Side A: O Shot Bob Dylan's 115th Nightmare Hey She Say Dog Day Afternoon Prologue for the Pure of Heart Side B: N.H.D.N. We Wear Mittens You're a Garbage Barge, I'm a Dream Boat Robots Can Fuck Your Shit Up Why Can't I Grow A Beard? Compliments Can Kill 7" A/B Split: Britt Daniel Stole My Girl Just Kids ----------------------- * Black Vinyl w/ Standard Jacket also available

options.name: Beer Colored Vinyl w/ Pop Up Jacket & Bonus 7"
